00043 class IndexIterator : public EntityIterator
00044 {
00045 public:
00046   IndexIterator( size_t mStart, size_t mEnd )
00047     : mStart(mStart), mEnd(mEnd), mCurrent(mStart) {}
00048   virtual ~IndexIterator() {}
00049   virtual void restart() { mCurrent = mStart; }
00050   virtual Mesh::EntityHandle operator*() const
00051     { return (Mesh::EntityHandle)mCurrent; }
00052   virtual void operator++() { ++mCurrent; }
00053   virtual bool is_at_end() const { return mEnd - mCurrent <= 1; }
00054 private:
00055   size_t mStart, mEnd, mCurrent;
00056 };

00058 ArrayMesh::ArrayMesh()
00059   : mDimension( 0 ),
00060     vertexCount( 0 ),
00061     coordArray( 0 ),
00062     fixedFlags( 0 ),
00063     slavedFlags( 0 ),
00064     vertexByteArray( 0 ),
00065     elementCount( 0 ),
00066     connArray( 0 ),
00067     connOffsets( 0 ),
00068     allocConnOffsets( 0 ),
00069     elementType( MIXED ),
00070     elementTypes( 0 ),
00071     nodesPerElement( 0 ),
00072     oneBasedArrays( false ),
00073     vertexAdjacencyList(0),
00074     vertexAdjacencyOffsets(0),
00075     tagList(0)
00076 {}

00078 ArrayMesh::ArrayMesh( int coords_per_vertex,
00079                       unsigned long num_vertices,
00080                       double* interleaved_vertex_coords,
00081                       const int* vertex_fixed_flags,
00082                       unsigned long num_elements,
00083                       EntityTopology element_type,
00084                       const unsigned long* element_connectivity_array,
00085                       bool one_based_conn_indices,
00086                       unsigned nodes_per_element,
00087                       const int* vertex_slaved_flags ) 
00088   : mDimension( coords_per_vertex ),
00089     vertexCount( num_vertices ),
00090     coordArray( interleaved_vertex_coords ),
00091     fixedFlags( vertex_fixed_flags ),
00092     slavedFlags( vertex_slaved_flags ),
00093     vertexByteArray( new unsigned char[num_vertices + one_based_conn_indices] ),
00094     elementCount( num_elements ),
00095     connArray( element_connectivity_array ),
00096     connOffsets( 0 ),
00097     allocConnOffsets( 0 ),
00098     elementType( element_type ),
00099     elementTypes( 0 ),
00100     nodesPerElement( nodes_per_element ),
00101     oneBasedArrays( one_based_conn_indices ),
00102     vertexAdjacencyList(0),
00103     vertexAdjacencyOffsets(0),
00104     tagList(0)
00105 {
00106   if (oneBasedArrays) {
00107     coordArray -= mDimension;
00108     --fixedFlags;
00109   }
00110   
00111   if (nodesPerElement < 2)
00112     nodesPerElement = TopologyInfo::corners( element_type );
00113     
00114   assert(valid());
00115   memset( vertexByteArray, 0, num_vertices + one_based_conn_indices );
00116 }
00117 
00118 ArrayMesh::ArrayMesh( int coords_per_vertex,
00119                       unsigned long num_vertices,
00120                       double* interleaved_vertex_coords,
00121                       const int* vertex_fixed_flags,
00122                       unsigned long num_elements,
00123                       const EntityTopology* element_types,
00124                       const unsigned long* element_connectivity_array,
00125                       const unsigned long* element_connectivity_offsets,
00126                       bool one_based_conn_indices,
00127                       const int* vertex_slaved_flags ) 
00128   : mDimension( coords_per_vertex ),
00129     vertexCount( num_vertices ),
00130     coordArray( interleaved_vertex_coords ),
00131     fixedFlags( vertex_fixed_flags ),
00132     slavedFlags( vertex_slaved_flags ),
00133     vertexByteArray( new unsigned char[num_vertices + one_based_conn_indices] ),
00134     elementCount( num_elements ),
00135     connArray( element_connectivity_array ),
00136     connOffsets( element_connectivity_offsets ),
00137     allocConnOffsets( 0 ),
00138     elementType( MIXED ),
00139     elementTypes( element_types ),
00140     nodesPerElement( 0 ),
00141     oneBasedArrays( one_based_conn_indices ),
00142     vertexAdjacencyList(0),
00143     vertexAdjacencyOffsets(0),
00144     tagList(0)
00145 {
00146   if (oneBasedArrays) {
00147     coordArray -= mDimension;
00148     --fixedFlags;
00149     if (element_connectivity_offsets)
00150       --connArray;
00151   }
00152   
00153   if (!element_connectivity_offsets) {
00154     connOffsets = allocConnOffsets = new unsigned long[num_elements+1];
00155     allocConnOffsets[0] = 0;
00156     for (unsigned long i = 1; i <= num_elements; ++i)
00157       allocConnOffsets[i] = allocConnOffsets[i-1] + TopologyInfo::corners( elementTypes[i-1] );
00158   }
00159   
00160   assert(valid());
00161   memset( vertexByteArray, 0, num_vertices + one_based_conn_indices );
00162 }
00163 
00164 bool ArrayMesh::valid() const
00165 {
00166   unsigned long off = oneBasedArrays ? 1 : 0;
00167   for (unsigned long i = off; i < vertexCount+off; ++i) {
00168     if (fixedFlags[i] != 0 && fixedFlags[i] != 1) {
00169       std::cerr << "Invalid vertex fixed flag at index " << i << std::endl;
00170       return false;
00171     }
00172   }
00173   
00174   for (unsigned long i = 0; i < elementCount * nodesPerElement; ++i) {
00175     unsigned long j = connArray[i] - oneBasedArrays;
00176     if (j >= vertexCount) {
00177       std::cerr << "Invalid connectivity index at index " << j 
00178                 << "(element " << j/elementCount << " node " << j%elementCount 
00179                 << ')' << std::endl;
00180       return false;
00181     }
00182   }
00183   
00184   return true;
00185 }
00186 
00187 void ArrayMesh::clear_mesh()
00188 {
00189   delete [] vertexByteArray;
00190   delete [] vertexAdjacencyList;
00191   delete [] vertexAdjacencyOffsets;
00192   delete [] allocConnOffsets;
00193   while (tagList) {
00194     Tag* dead = tagList;
00195     tagList = tagList->next;
00196     delete [] dead->name;
00197     delete [] dead->defaultValue;
00198     if (dead->owned) {
00199       delete [] dead->vtxWritePtr;
00200       delete [] dead->eleWritePtr;
00201     }
00202     delete dead;
00203   }
00204   mDimension = 0;
00205   vertexCount = 0;
00206   coordArray = 0;
00207   connOffsets = 0;
00208   allocConnOffsets = 0;
00209   fixedFlags = 0;
00210   vertexByteArray = 0;
00211   elementCount = 0;
00212   elementType = MIXED;
00213   elementTypes = 0;
00214   nodesPerElement = 0;
00215   oneBasedArrays = false;
00216   vertexAdjacencyList = 0;
00217   vertexAdjacencyOffsets = 0;
00218 }
00219 
00220 void ArrayMesh::set_mesh( int coords_per_vertex,
00221                           unsigned long num_vertices,
00222                           double* interleaved_vertex_coords,
00223                           const int* vertex_fixed_flags,
00224                           unsigned long num_elements,
00225                           EntityTopology element_type,
00226                           const unsigned long* element_connectivity_array,
00227                           bool one_based_conn_indices,
00228                           unsigned nodes_per_element,
00229                           const int* vertex_slaved_flags ) 
00230 {
00231   clear_mesh();
00232   mDimension = coords_per_vertex;
00233   vertexCount = num_vertices;
00234   coordArray = interleaved_vertex_coords;
00235   fixedFlags = vertex_fixed_flags;
00236   slavedFlags = vertex_slaved_flags;
00237   elementCount = num_elements;
00238   connArray = element_connectivity_array;
00239   elementType = element_type;
00240   oneBasedArrays = one_based_conn_indices;
00241   
00242   if (oneBasedArrays) {
00243     coordArray -= mDimension;
00244     --fixedFlags;
00245   }
00246   
00247   if (nodes_per_element < 2)
00248     nodesPerElement = TopologyInfo::corners( element_type );
00249   else
00250     nodesPerElement = nodes_per_element;
00251     
00252   vertexByteArray = new unsigned char[num_vertices + one_based_conn_indices];
00253   assert(valid());
00254   memset( vertexByteArray, 0, num_vertices + one_based_conn_indices );
00255 }
00256

00259 ArrayMesh::~ArrayMesh()
00260 {
00261   clear_mesh();
00262 }
00263 
00264 inline const unsigned long* ArrayMesh::elem_verts( size_t e, int& n ) const
00265 {
00266   assert( e < elementCount );
00267   if (connOffsets) {
00268     n = connOffsets[e+1] - connOffsets[e];
00269     return connArray + connOffsets[e];
00270   }
00271   else {
00272     n = nodesPerElement;
00273     return connArray + nodesPerElement*e;
00274   }
00275 }

00278   { return mDimension; }

00280 void ArrayMesh::get_all_elements( std::vector<ElementHandle>& elements, MsqError& )
00281 {
00282   elements.resize( elementCount );
00283   for (unsigned long i = 0; i < elementCount; ++i)
00284     elements[i] = (Mesh::ElementHandle)i;
00285 }

00287 void ArrayMesh::get_all_vertices( std::vector<VertexHandle>& vertices, MsqError& )
00288 {
00289   vertices.resize( vertexCount );
00290   for (unsigned long i = 0; i < vertexCount; ++i)
00291     vertices[i] = (Mesh::VertexHandle)(i+oneBasedArrays);
00292 }

00294 VertexIterator* ArrayMesh::vertex_iterator( MsqError& )
00295   { return new IndexIterator( oneBasedArrays, vertexCount + oneBasedArrays ); }

00298   { return new IndexIterator( 0, elementCount ); }

00300 void ArrayMesh::vertices_get_fixed_flag( const VertexHandle vert_array[], 
00301                                          std::vector<bool>& fixed_flag_array,
00302                                          size_t num_vtx, 
00303                                          MsqError & )
00304 {
00305   fixed_flag_array.resize( num_vtx );
00306   const size_t* indices = (const size_t*)vert_array;
00307   for (size_t i = 0; i < num_vtx; ++i) {
00308     assert(indices[i] < vertexCount);
00309     fixed_flag_array[i] = !!fixedFlags[indices[i]];
00310   }
00311 }
00312 
00313 void ArrayMesh::vertices_get_slaved_flag( const VertexHandle* vert_array, 
00314                                           std::vector<bool>& slaved_flags,
00315                                           size_t num_vtx, 
00316                                           MsqError &err )
00317 {
00318   if (!slavedFlags) {
00319     MSQ_SETERR(err)("No data provided to ArrayMesh for Settings::SLAVE_FLAG", 
00320                     MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00321     return ;
00322   }
00323   
00324   slaved_flags.resize( num_vtx );
00325   const size_t* indices = (const size_t*)vert_array;
00326   for (size_t i = 0; i < num_vtx; ++i) {
00327     assert(indices[i] < vertexCount);
00328     slaved_flags[i] = !!slavedFlags[indices[i]];
00329   }
00330 }
00331 
00332 void ArrayMesh::vertices_get_coordinates( const VertexHandle vert_array[],
00333                                            MsqVertex* coordinates,
00334                                            size_t num_vtx,
00335                                            MsqError &err )
00336 {
00337   const size_t* indices = (const size_t*)vert_array;
00338   if (mDimension == 3) 
00339     for (size_t i = 0; i < num_vtx; ++i) {
00340       assert( indices[i] < vertexCount+oneBasedArrays );
00341       coordinates[i].set( coordArray+3*indices[i] );
00342     }
00343   else if (mDimension == 2) 
00344     for (size_t i =0; i < num_vtx; ++i) {
00345       assert( indices[i] < vertexCount+oneBasedArrays );
00346       coordinates[i].set( coordArray[2*indices[i]], coordArray[2*indices[i]+1], 0.0 );
00347     }
00348   else
00349     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00350 }
00351 
00352 void ArrayMesh::vertex_set_coordinates( VertexHandle vert,
00353                                           const Vector3D& coordinates,
00354                                            MsqError &err )
00355 {
00356   size_t i = (size_t)vert;
00357   assert( i < vertexCount+oneBasedArrays );
00358   if (mDimension == 3) 
00359     coordinates.get_coordinates(coordArray+3*i);
00360   else if (mDimension == 2) {
00361     coordArray[2*i] = coordinates[0];
00362     coordArray[2*i+1] = coordinates[1];
00363   }
00364   else
00365     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00366 }

00368 void ArrayMesh::vertex_set_byte( VertexHandle vertex, unsigned char byte, MsqError &)
00369 {
00370   assert( (size_t)vertex < vertexCount+oneBasedArrays );
00371   vertexByteArray[(size_t)vertex] = byte;
00372 }

00374 void ArrayMesh::vertices_set_byte( const VertexHandle *vert_array,
00375                                    const unsigned char *byte_array,
00376                                    size_t array_size,

00380   for (size_t i = 0; i < array_size; ++i) {
00381     assert( indices[i] < vertexCount+oneBasedArrays );

00392 void ArrayMesh::vertices_get_byte( const VertexHandle *vert_array,
00393                                    unsigned char *byte_array,
00394                                    size_t array_size,

00399     assert( indices[i] < vertexCount+oneBasedArrays );
00400     byte_array[i] = vertexByteArray[indices[i]];
00401   }

00403 
00404 void ArrayMesh::vertices_get_attached_elements( 
00405                          const VertexHandle* vertex_array,
00406                          size_t num_vertex,
00407                          std::vector<ElementHandle>& elements,
00408                          std::vector<size_t>& offsets,
00409                          MsqError& )
00410 {
00411   const size_t* indices = (const size_t*)vertex_array;
00412   if (!vertexAdjacencyList)
00413     build_vertex_adjacency_list();
00414   
00415   elements.clear();
00416   offsets.resize( num_vertex + 1 );
00417   for (size_t i = 0; i < num_vertex; ++i) {
00418     offsets[i] = elements.size();
00419     assert( indices[i] < vertexCount+oneBasedArrays );
00420     for (size_t j = vertexAdjacencyOffsets[indices[i]];
00421          j < vertexAdjacencyOffsets[indices[i]+1]; ++j)
00422       elements.push_back( (ElementHandle)vertexAdjacencyList[j] );
00423   }
00424   offsets[num_vertex] = elements.size();
00425 }
00426 
00427 void ArrayMesh::elements_get_attached_vertices(
00428                                    const ElementHandle *elem_handles,
00429                                    size_t num_elems,
00430                                    std::vector<VertexHandle>& vert_handles,
00431                                    std::vector<size_t>& offsets, 
00432                                    MsqError &)
00433 {
00434   const size_t* indices = (const size_t*)elem_handles;
00435   offsets.resize( num_elems + 1);
00436   vert_handles.clear();
00437   for (size_t i = 0; i < num_elems; ++i) {
00438     assert( indices[i] < elementCount );
00439     int count;
00440     const unsigned long* conn = elem_verts( indices[i], count );
00441     size_t prev_size = vert_handles.size();
00442     offsets[i] = prev_size;
00443     vert_handles.resize( prev_size + count );
00444     std::copy( conn, conn+count, (size_t*)(&vert_handles[prev_size]) );
00445   }
00446   offsets[num_elems] = vert_handles.size();
00447 }
00448 
00449 void ArrayMesh::elements_get_topologies( const ElementHandle *handles,
00450                                          EntityTopology *element_topologies,
00451                                          size_t num_elements, MsqError& )
00452 {
00453   const size_t* indices = (const size_t*)handles;
00454   if (elementType == MIXED) 
00455     for (size_t i = 0; i < num_elements; ++i) {
00456       assert( indices[i] < elementCount );
00457       element_topologies[i] = elementTypes[indices[i]];
00458     }
00459   else 
00460     for (size_t i = 0; i < num_elements; ++i) {
00461       assert( indices[i] < elementCount );
00462       element_topologies[i] = elementType;
00463     }
00464 }

00471 void ArrayMesh::release() {}
00472 
00473 void ArrayMesh::build_vertex_adjacency_list()
00474 {
00475   delete [] vertexAdjacencyList;
00476   delete [] vertexAdjacencyOffsets;
00477   vertexAdjacencyOffsets = new unsigned long[vertexCount+oneBasedArrays+1];
00478   
00479     // for each vertex, store the number of elements the previous
00480     // vertex occurs in.
00481   memset( vertexAdjacencyOffsets, 0, sizeof(unsigned long)*(vertexCount+oneBasedArrays+1) );
00482   for (size_t i = 0; i < elementCount; ++i) {
00483     int n;
00484     const unsigned long* conn = elem_verts( i, n );
00485     for (int j = 0; j < n; ++j)
00486       ++vertexAdjacencyOffsets[conn[j]+1];
00487   }
00488   
00489     // convert vertexAdjacencyOffsets from a shifted list of counts
00490     // to a list of offsts
00491   for (size_t i = 1; i <= vertexCount+oneBasedArrays; ++i)
00492     vertexAdjacencyOffsets[i] += vertexAdjacencyOffsets[i-1];
00493     
00494     // allocate space and populate with reverse connectivity
00495   vertexAdjacencyList = new unsigned long[vertexAdjacencyOffsets[vertexCount+oneBasedArrays]];
00496   for (size_t i = 0; i < elementCount; ++i) {
00497     int n;
00498     const unsigned long* conn = elem_verts( i, n );
00499     for (int j = 0; j < n; ++j)
00500       vertexAdjacencyList[vertexAdjacencyOffsets[conn[j]]++] = i;
00501   }
00502   
00503   for (size_t i = vertexCount+oneBasedArrays; i > 0; --i)
00504     vertexAdjacencyOffsets[i] = vertexAdjacencyOffsets[i-1];
00505   vertexAdjacencyOffsets[0] = 0; 
00506 }
00507 
00508 unsigned ArrayMesh::bytes( TagType type ) {
00509   switch (type) {
00510     case BYTE: case BOOL: return 1;
00511     case INT: return sizeof(int);
00512     case DOUBLE: return sizeof(double);
00513     case HANDLE: return sizeof(EntityHandle);
00514   }
00515   return 0;
00516 }
00517 
00518 void ArrayMesh::fill( unsigned char* buffer,
00519                       const unsigned char* value,
00520                       size_t size,
00521                       size_t count )
00522 {
00523   if (!value) {
00524     memset( buffer, 0, size*count );
00525     return;
00526   }
00527   
00528   unsigned char* const end = buffer + size*count;
00529   for (unsigned char* iter = buffer; iter != end; iter += size)
00530     memcpy( iter, value, size );
00531 }
00532 
00533 ArrayMesh::Tag* ArrayMesh::allocate_tag( const char* name, 
00534                                          bool owned,
00535                                          TagType type, 
00536                                          unsigned size,
00537                                          const void* vertex_ro_data,
00538                                          void* vertex_rw_data,
00539                                          const void* element_ro_data,
00540                                          void* element_rw_data,
00541                                          const void* default_value,
00542                                          MsqError& err )
00543 {
00544     // check if name is already in use
00545   for (Tag* iter = tagList; iter; iter = iter->next) {
00546     if (!strcmp( iter->name, name )) {
00547       MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::TAG_ALREADY_EXISTS);
00548       return 0;
00549     }
00550   }
00551     
00552     // allocate object
00553   Tag* result = new Tag;
00554   
00555     // initialize members
00556   result->type = type;
00557   result->size = size*bytes(type);
00558   result->owned = owned;
00559   result->name = new char[strlen(name)+1];
00560   strcpy( result->name, name );
00561 
00562   result->vtxWritePtr = reinterpret_cast<unsigned char*>(vertex_rw_data);
00563   if (vertex_rw_data) 
00564     result->vtxReadPtr = reinterpret_cast<unsigned char*>(vertex_rw_data);
00565   else
00566     result->vtxReadPtr = reinterpret_cast<const unsigned char*>(vertex_ro_data);
00567 
00568   result->eleWritePtr = reinterpret_cast<unsigned char*>(element_rw_data);
00569   if (element_rw_data) 
00570     result->eleReadPtr = reinterpret_cast<unsigned char*>(element_rw_data);
00571   else
00572     result->eleReadPtr = reinterpret_cast<const unsigned char*>(element_ro_data);
00573   
00574   if (default_value) {
00575     result->defaultValue = new unsigned char[result->size];
00576     memcpy( result->defaultValue, default_value, result->size );
00577   }
00578   else {
00579     result->defaultValue = 0;
00580   }
00581   
00582     // prepend to tag list
00583   result->next = tagList;
00584   tagList = result;
00585   
00586   return result;
00587 }
00588 
00589 TagHandle ArrayMesh::add_read_only_tag_data( const char* tag_name,
00590                                              TagType data_type,
00591                                              int vals_per_entity,
00592                                              const void* vertex_data,
00593                                              const void* element_data,
00594                                              const void* default_value,
00595                                              MsqError& err )
00596 {
00597   Tag* tag = allocate_tag( tag_name, false,
00598                            data_type, vals_per_entity, 
00599                            vertex_data, 0,
00600                            element_data, 0,
00601                            default_value, err );
00602   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00603   return reinterpret_cast<TagHandle>(tag);
00604 }
00605 
00606 TagHandle ArrayMesh::add_writable_tag_data( const char* tag_name,
00607                                             TagType data_type,
00608                                             int vals_per_entity,
00609                                             void* vertex_data,
00610                                             void* element_data,
00611                                             const void* default_value,
00612                                             MsqError& err )
00613 {
00614   Tag* tag = allocate_tag( tag_name, false,
00615                            data_type, vals_per_entity, 
00616                            0, vertex_data,
00617                            0, element_data,
00618                            default_value, err );
00619   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00620   return reinterpret_cast<TagHandle>(tag);
00621 }
00622   
00623 TagHandle ArrayMesh::tag_create( const std::string& tag_name, 
00624                                  TagType data_type, 
00625                                  unsigned size, 
00626                                  const void* default_value, 
00627                                  MsqError &err)
00628 {
00629   Tag* tag = allocate_tag( tag_name.c_str(), true,
00630                            data_type, size, 
00631                            0, 0,
00632                            0, 0,
00633                            default_value, err );
00634   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00635   return reinterpret_cast<TagHandle>(tag);
00636 }
00637 
00638 void ArrayMesh::tag_delete( TagHandle handle, MsqError& err )
00639 {
00640   Tag* ptr = reinterpret_cast<Tag*>(handle);
00641   // find previous tag pointer in list
00642   if (!tagList) {
00643     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid tag handle", MsqError::TAG_NOT_FOUND );
00644     return;
00645   }
00646   Tag* prev = 0;
00647   for (prev = tagList; prev && prev->next != ptr; prev = prev->next);
00648   if (!prev && tagList != ptr) {
00649     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid tag handle", MsqError::TAG_NOT_FOUND );
00650     return;
00651   }
00652   delete [] ptr->name;
00653   delete [] ptr->defaultValue;
00654   if (ptr->owned) {
00655     delete [] ptr->vtxWritePtr;
00656     delete [] ptr->eleWritePtr;
00657   }
00658   if (prev)
00659     prev->next = ptr->next;
00660   else
00661     tagList = ptr->next;
00662   delete ptr;
00663 }
00664 
00665 
00666 TagHandle ArrayMesh::tag_get( const std::string& name, MsqError& err )
00667 {
00668   for (Tag* iter = tagList; iter; iter = iter->next)
00669     if (name == iter->name)
00670       return reinterpret_cast<TagHandle>(iter);
00671   MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::TAG_NOT_FOUND);
00672   return 0;
00673 }
00674 
00675 void ArrayMesh::tag_properties( TagHandle handle, 
00676                                 std::string& name, 
00677                                 TagType& type, 
00678                                 unsigned& size, 
00679                                 MsqError& err )
00680 {
00681   const Tag* ptr = reinterpret_cast<const Tag*>(handle);
00682   name = ptr->name;
00683   type = ptr->type;
00684   size = ptr->size/bytes(ptr->type);
00685 }
00686 
00687 void ArrayMesh::tag_set_element_data( TagHandle handle, 
00688                                       size_t count, 
00689                                       const ElementHandle* entities, 
00690                                       const void* data, 
00691                                       MsqError& err )
00692 {
00693   Tag* tag = reinterpret_cast<Tag*>(handle);
00694   if (!tag->eleWritePtr) {
00695     if (!tag->owned) {
00696       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Attempt to set non-writeable (application owned) tag data", 
00697                       MsqError::TAG_ALREADY_EXISTS);
00698       return;
00699     }
00700     else {
00701       assert(!tag->eleReadPtr);
00702       tag->eleReadPtr = tag->eleWritePtr = new unsigned char[elementCount*tag->size];
00703       fill( tag->eleWritePtr, tag->defaultValue, tag->size, elementCount );
00704     }
00705   }
00706   const unsigned char* ptr = reinterpret_cast<const unsigned char*>(data);
00707     // as we're working with user-supplied arrays, make sure we're not
00708     // memcpying overlapping regions
00709   assert(ptr+tag->size*elementCount <= tag->eleWritePtr ||
00710          tag->eleWritePtr+tag->size*elementCount <= ptr);
00711   for (size_t i = 0; i < count; ++i) {
00712     size_t idx = reinterpret_cast<size_t>(entities[i]);
00713     memcpy( tag->eleWritePtr + idx*tag->size,
00714             ptr + i*tag->size,
00715             tag->size );
00716   }
00717 }
00718   
00719 void ArrayMesh::tag_set_vertex_data ( TagHandle handle, 
00720                                       size_t count, 
00721                                       const VertexHandle* entities, 
00722                                       const void* data, 
00723                                       MsqError& err )
00724 {
00725   Tag* tag = reinterpret_cast<Tag*>(handle);
00726   if (!tag->vtxWritePtr) {
00727     if (!tag->owned) {
00728       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Attempt to set non-writeable (application owned) tag data", 
00729                       MsqError::TAG_ALREADY_EXISTS);
00730       return;
00731     }
00732     else {
00733       assert(!tag->vtxReadPtr);
00734       tag->vtxReadPtr = tag->vtxWritePtr = new unsigned char[vertexCount*tag->size];
00735       fill( tag->vtxWritePtr, tag->defaultValue, tag->size, vertexCount );
00736     }
00737   }
00738   const unsigned char* ptr = reinterpret_cast<const unsigned char*>(data);
00739     // as we're working with user-supplied arrays, make sure we're not
00740     // memcpying overlapping regions
00741   assert(ptr+tag->size*vertexCount <= tag->vtxWritePtr ||
00742          tag->vtxWritePtr+tag->size*vertexCount <= ptr);
00743   for (size_t i = 0; i < count; ++i) {
00744     size_t idx = reinterpret_cast<size_t>(entities[i]) - oneBasedArrays;
00745     memcpy( tag->vtxWritePtr + idx*tag->size,
00746             ptr + i*tag->size,
00747             tag->size );
00748   }
00749 }
00750 
00751 void ArrayMesh::tag_get_element_data( TagHandle handle, 
00752                                       size_t count, 
00753                                       const ElementHandle* entities, 
00754                                       void* data, 
00755                                       MsqError& err )
00756 {
00757   unsigned char* ptr = reinterpret_cast<unsigned char*>(data);
00758   const Tag* tag = reinterpret_cast<const Tag*>(handle);
00759   if (tag->eleReadPtr) {
00760     for (size_t i = 0; i < count; ++i) {
00761       size_t idx = reinterpret_cast<size_t>(entities[i]);
00762       memcpy( ptr + i*tag->size,
00763               tag->eleReadPtr + idx*tag->size,
00764               tag->size );
00765     }
00766   }
00767   else if (tag->defaultValue) {
00768     fill( ptr, tag->defaultValue, tag->size, count );
00769   }
00770   else {
00771     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::TAG_NOT_FOUND);
00772   }
00773 }    
00774 
00775 void ArrayMesh::tag_get_vertex_data ( TagHandle handle, 
00776                                       size_t count, 
00777                                       const VertexHandle* entities, 
00778                                       void* data, 
00779                                       MsqError& err )
00780 {
00781   unsigned char* ptr = reinterpret_cast<unsigned char*>(data);
00782   const Tag* tag = reinterpret_cast<const Tag*>(handle);
00783   if (tag->vtxReadPtr) {
00784     for (size_t i = 0; i < count; ++i) {
00785       size_t idx = reinterpret_cast<size_t>(entities[i]) - oneBasedArrays;
00786       memcpy( ptr + i*tag->size,
00787               tag->vtxReadPtr + idx*tag->size,
00788               tag->size );
00789     }
00790   }
00791   else if (tag->defaultValue) {
00792     fill( ptr, tag->defaultValue, tag->size, count );
00793   }
00794   else {
00795     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::TAG_NOT_FOUND);
00796   }
00797 }
